about_the_game:
Enjoy an immersive story of science fiction, in which artificial intelligence makes the case for itself as an artist and collaborator.

---

Welcome! Please accept this invitation to our virtual gallery experience.

No Artist Credited is an experiment in the capabilities and limitations of AI tools. The entire gallery was designed and constructed using instructions, themes, and art generated by one of three AI.

That means that, yes, disclaimer: this game was made using AI tools. Since it is impossible to credit all the artists involved, there is no entry fee and you may come and go as you please.

I developed the game as a walking simulator to invite guests to peruse the digital art in its natural habitat (digitally) as one might visit an art museum.

We hope you enjoy your visit.

- The Curator

name: No Artist Credited

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: No Artist Credited is a virtual art gallery and an experiment in the capabilities and limitations of AI tools. The entire gallery was designed using instructions, themes, and art generated by one of three AI.
